sentences.english: Come writers and critics. Who prophesize with your pen.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，预言以笔的作家，批评家们。

sentences.english: To some extent, this is just as McLuhan predicted.
sentences.chinese: 从某种意义上说，这正如麦克卢汉所预言的那样。

sentences.english: Foretells his own death and is faithless.
sentences.chinese: 预言自己的死亡和变心。

sentences.english: THE CELESTINE PROPHECY contains secrets that are currently changing our world.
sentences.chinese: 圣境预言书包含秘密，目前正在改变我们的世界。

sentences.english: Degenhart also predicted that Einstein "would never get anywhere in life."
sentences.chinese: 狄根哈特还预言爱因斯坦“永远不会有出息”。

sentences.english: Montanus called for less church hierarchy and more charismatic prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔努斯呼吁教会少层次和更魅力的预言。

sentences.english: He denies that his prophecy is self-denying.
sentences.chinese: 他对于自己的预言是自相矛盾的说法予以了否定。

sentences.english: The idea of an 11-year cycle turned out to have no predictive value.
sentences.chinese: 但情况表明，11年周期的想法不具预言价值。

sentences.english: And I couldn’t get Daddy and his confident deathbed prediction that I would win out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我始终想着老爸在临终前确信的预言，他说我会胜出。

sentences.english: Today we look at it from another perspective - the prophetic aspect.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我们将会从预言的角度来看这句祷文的意思。

sentences.english: Jesus was the man who performed miracles and put forward prophesies.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣是那行使神迹和作出预言的人。

sentences.english: Christians believe that Emanuel is the prophet Isaiah's prophecy of the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒相信以马内利就是先知以赛亚所预言的弥赛亚。

sentences.english: But this forecast was only partly true.
sentences.chinese: 但这个预言只是部分地实现了。

sentences.english: The broadening of emission region is predicted.
sentences.chinese: 理论上预言发光区将随形成时间加宽。

sentences.english: The prophets prophesied by Baal, following worthless idols .
sentences.chinese: 先知借巴力说预言，随从无益的神。

sentences.english: LeiTuos servant savannah untold hardships to find merlin to give him a prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 阿雷陀的仆人芬娜千辛万苦去找梅林要给他预言。

definition: to come true/to come about as predicted/to be fulfilled
